TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ItemCollection extends System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReadOnlyMetadataCollection`1<class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.GlobalItem>

Docs.summary: A base class for , , and classes. An ItemCollection class is an abstract class and provides the core API for loading and holding the in-memory metadata. This class is derived from the <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReadOnlyMetadataCollection%601> class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information, see [Item Collections (Metadata)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/3051a40a-ff45-42f8-8f93-7545e427a404).

.property instance valuetype System.Data.Metadata.Edm.DataSpace DataSpace

Docs.summary: Gets the data model associated with this item collection.
Docs.value: The data model associated with this item collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property returns <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.DataSpace> for <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ObjectItemCollection>; <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.DataSpace> for <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmItemCollection>; and <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.DataSpace> for <xref:System.Data.Mapping.StorageMappingItemCollection>.
